nodes.text: The Ozzel family was a bloodline hailing from the planet Carida. They were brought into wealth through the efforts of trading mastermind Mann Ozzel ages before the Galactic Empire. Other famous members included Ruthbert Ozzel and Enos Ozzel.

By the time of the Declaration of a New Order, the Ozzel family had done service in the Republic Navy for centuries and were counted among the Generationals. They maintained a hereditary manse in the Sirpar Hills on Anaxes. Kendal Ozzel eventually served as an admiral in the Imperial Navy, commanding the Star Dreadnought Executor.
